TranslatedCode:
/*
 * 
 * Name NameStartCharNameChars
 * @param char 
 * @see https://www.w3.org/TR/xml/ 2.3 Names and Tokens
 * @return NameStartChar
 */
export function isNameStartChar(char: string): boolean {
  let cp = getCodePoint(char);

  return cp === 0x3A // :
  || cp === 0x5F // _
  || (cp >= 0x41 && cp <= 0x5A) // A-Z
  || (cp >= 0x61 && cp <= 0x7A) // a-z
  || (cp >= 0xC0 && cp <= 0xD6)
  || (cp >= 0xD8 && cp <= 0xF6)
  || (cp >= 0xF8 && cp <= 0x2FF)
  || (cp >= 0x370 && cp <= 0x37D)
  || (cp >= 0x37F && cp <= 0x1FFF)
  || (cp >= 0x200C && cp <= 0x200D)
  || (cp >= 0x2070 && cp <= 0x218F)
  || (cp >= 0x2C00 && cp <= 0x2FEF)
  || (cp >= 0x3001 && cp <= 0xD7FF)
  || (cp >= 0xF900 && cp <= 0xFDCF)
  || (cp >= 0xFDF0 && cp <= 0xFFFD)
  || (cp >= 0x10000 && cp <= 0xEFFFF);
}
